data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Molineri, C. (2014): Description of Alloretochus sigillatus new species with comments and new distributional records for Alloretochus peruanicus (Ephemeroptera, Caenidae, Brachycercinae). Zootaxa 3821 (1): 139-145, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3821.1.11
